customer_reviews.title: Frustrating and time consuming
customer_reviews.text: Dragon dictate was easy enough to install and set up. I went through the script required to get the software used to my way of speaking. In practical use it fell down in not recognising words and phrases, substituting totally wrong ones. Even spelling out, or being more deliberate and clear in pronunciation, what it came up with was still incorrect. This happened too often to be considered acceptable. Trying to re-educate Dragon made no difference. Correcting this was time consuming, and dealing with punctuation made it even more frustrating. I returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: Johannsen

customer_reviews.title: Presumably good if you can get it to run
customer_reviews.text: The product installed and registered and an introductory tutorial ran following on. But when I tried to start the program from the shortcut or from the library on C:\ drive, it would not respond and ended with no error message. I bought NS 11 and NS 12 and was hoping to benefit from NS 13. It is possible that the antivirus I use is to blame (I recently changed it -- it's a 1 year subscription) but I can't realistically uninstall the antivirus which needs to be there all the time. This situation is frustrating because there is no effective alternative to NS for either windows or linux.
customer_reviews.author: phonetique

customer_reviews.title: Faster, smarter and user friendly.
customer_reviews.text: Having had Dragon for many years the review for version 13 sounded too good to be true. However despite initial problems with 3 different head sets with inbuilt microphones it hashould now worked and has exceeded all my expectations. It's faster. More accurate. Easy to use and much more intuitive than previous versions. I found that buying a gaming headset for an x box from Turtle Beach to be the best accessory I have ever bought. As a dyslexic I have found new faith in Dragon and strongly recommend it to anyone.

product_meta.description:
Platform:PC| Edition:Home

Use your voice to get more done faster.View larger  INTRODUCING DRAGON NATURALLYSPEAKING SOFTWARE 
If you are a parent, student, retiree, busy multitasker, or someone who spends a lot of time on a computer, you may want an easy and enjoyable alternative to typing to connect with your computer every day. Using a keyboard and mouse as your primary computer interface can be slow, require a lot of correction, and cause stress and strain on your arms, neck, or back, even if you are a fast typist. What if you had another way to interface with your computer that is natural, accurate, and a fun, easy way to get more done? Dragon NaturallySpeaking 13 Home speech recognition software lets you get more done every day on your computer – quickly and accurately – using your voice. It's the fun, easy way to turn your spoken words into text much faster than you can type, and execute simple voice commands for big productivity gains.

 SO, WHAT ARE THE ADVANTAGES? 
You can talk up to three times faster than you can type. With Dragon, you simply talk and your words appear on screen, enabling you to get more done faster. There's also freedom and flexibility to work the way you want, enabling you to use your computer in a comfortable, ergonomic way, supporting voice control, dictation, and editing capabilities in most productivity and web applications. Use the included Nuance approved microphone or the mic built into many of the latest laptops for optimal flexibility and convenience. It's easy to get started and easy to master, providing fast, easy setup, helpful tutorials, and intuitive access to a rich and powerful feature set. Dragon 13 enables you to experience the benefits of speech recognition right away and realise ever-increasing productivity gains the more you use it.

 FEATURES AND BENEFITS 
Dragon delivers up to 99% speech recognition accuracy right out of the box, providing a personalised voice driven experience, learning words and phrases you use the most and delivering accurate results the more you use it. You can also use your voice to dictate documents or enter text anywhere you normally type. Dragon eliminates barriers to productivity and creativity by letting you interact with your computer by voice. It turns your spoken thoughts into text and your voice commands into action so you don't have to worry about the mechanics of typing and spelling.


Choose audio.  EDIT AND FORMAT DOCUMENTS, ALL BY VOICE 
Dragon allows you to select text, make edits, and apply formatting such as bold, underline, capitalisation, and more, using your voice to make easy work of document creation. "Smart format rules" automatically adapt to how you want abbreviations, numbers, and more to appear, so you don't have to correct them every time.

Learn from sent email.View larger  COMMAND AND CONTROL YOUR COMPUTER, ALL BY VOICE 
Launch applications, select menu items, execute key functions, switch windows, search the web, create and send emails, and more, all by voice. It gives you the flexibility to work hands-free if desired, and experience more ergonomic comfort when working on your PC.

Vocabulary editor.View larger  ENJOY SUPERIOR DICTATION, VOICE EDITING, AND VOICE COMMAND IN MANY POPULAR WEB APPLICATIONS 
Dragon gives you robust voice command and control as well as "full text control" (full voice-driven editing and command capabilities) within many popular applications, including web applications such as Gmail, Outlook.com, and Yahoo! Mail within Internet Explorer, Firefox, and Chrome, enabling you to create documents and zip through computer tasks in record time.

Wordpress with FTC.View larger  CHOOSE YOUR MICROPHONE OPTION FOR FREEDOM AND FLEXIBILITY 
With automatic microphone detection, Dragon will conveniently show you which microphones are available for you to use. You can also use multiple audio device types within the same profile, meaning that you can easily switch to another microphone while keeping all your personalised preferences for accuracy and formatting. Dragon 13 will also support microphones built into many of the latest laptops, so you're free to dictate documents and speak commands without even using a headset.

Gmail with DragonBar and Links.View larger  SIMPLIFY PROOFREADING TO A WHOLE NEW LEVEL 
Dragon's natural-sounding text-to-speech capability reads designated text to you, simplifying proofreading and supporting new levels of multitasking.

Interactive tutorial.View larger  EASY TO GET STARTED, EASY TO MASTER 
Dragon makes it easy to get started with speech recognition and become even more proficient with regular use. It's also simple to explore more advanced features that can boost your productivity even further.
